creator: tingw@hotmail.com
text:
I've used PatternLayout: "%-5p %c{1} %d{ISO8601} %M - %m%n", and
started seeing word 'java' being filled in by %M property, instead of
actual method name in the output line.

creator: mwomack@apache.org
text: What version of log4j are you using?  What version of Java are you using?

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Not enough info to reproduce or diagnose.
